mapper.select: select s.name statirName,sum(ps.storeNumber) totalNumber from stair s join secondary sec on s.secondary_id = sec.id join productstock ps on sec.product_id = ps.product_id group by s.name

select s.name statirName, sum(sale.costAmount) totalCost,sum(sale.saleAmount) totalSale from stair s join secondary sec on s.secondary_id = sec.id join productstock ps on sec.product_id = ps.product_id join saleascount sale on sec.product_id = sale.product_id group by s.name

select MONTH(sale.vdate) saleMonth, sum(sale.saleAmount) totalSale,sum(sale.saleAmount - sale.costAmount) profit from stair s join secondary sec on s.secondary_id = sec.id join productstock ps on sec.product_id = ps.product_id join saleascount sale on sec.product_id = sale.product_id group by MONTH(sale.vdate)
